goal.ch: 研究複解析函數的基本性質，培養數學思維能力，提供其他應用領域的積分計算工具。
goal.en: “To study the basic properties of complex analytic functions, to develop mathematical thinking in analyzing complex problems, and to provide computational tools for integrals.“

outline.ch: 研究複解析函數的基本性質，培養數學思維能力，提供其他應用領域的積分計算工具。授課16週；第17週學生報告。無期末考試。
outline.en: “To study the basic properties of complex analytic functions, to develop mathematical thinking in analyzing complex problems, and to provide computational tools for integrals.“ Classroom lectures for 16 weeks. The 17th week is for student reports. No final exam.

textbook.ch: 2003  D. G. Zill,  A First Course in Complex Analysis
textbook.en: 2003  D. G. Zill,  A First Course in Complex Analysis

gradMethod.ch: 作業：40％； 小考：30％; 期中考：30％；報告（加分): 10％;  需按要求出席；缺席一次扣分1％.
gradMethod.en: Homework: 40％; Quiz: 30％; mid-term exam: 30％; Report for extra credit: 10％; Attendance required; each absence will be compensated by 1％.

officeHour.ch: 星期一 晚上七點至九點；或另外約時間。

flexDiscription.ch: 授課16週；第17週報告；第18週處理作業，小考的事宜。
flexDiscription.en: lecture for 16 weeks. Student presentation in Week 17. The exam week (Week 18) is for remaining issues about homework and quizzes.

ch: 系所:限數學系。年級:限三年級。班別:限A。指定課程:必須擋修MA2045。
系所:限數學系。年級:限四年級。指定課程:必須擋修MA2045。
系所:限理學院學士班。年級:限三年級、四年級。指定課程:必須擋修MA2045。
en: Department:Department of Mathematics only.Year:Third Year only.Class:A only.Specific Subject Requirements:Course blockingMA2045 only.
Department:Department of Mathematics only.Year:Fourth Year only.Specific Subject Requirements:Course blockingMA2045 only.
Department:Joint Science Program only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.Specific Subject Requirements:Course blockingMA2045 only.
